notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by a Collaborative Research Centre grant of the German Research Foundation (316249678 – SFB 1279) to J.M. J.A.M. is indebted to the Baden-Württemberg Stiftung for the financial support of this research project by the Eliteprogramme for Postdocs. C.C. is a part of and R.G. is funded by a scholarship from the International Graduate School of Molecular Medicine Ulm.
